pr_title: AF-2404 : Package dropdown button is not visible (slowly appears) when creating an asset

timeline.message:
AF-2404 : Package dropdown button is not visible (slowly appears) when creating an asset

 * Fixed invisible pacakge dropdown by setting it up on PostConstruct in KieSelectElement.

 * Moved unnecessary multiple callbacks to one for PackageListBox.

 * Removed parent container of KieSelectElement to be used directly.

AF-2404 : Package dropdown button is not visible (slowly appears) when creating an asset

 * Fixed invisible pacakge dropdown by setting it up on PostConstruct in KieSelectElement.

 * Moved unnecessary multiple callbacks to one for PackageListBox.

 * Removed parent container of KieSelectElement to be used directly.

replies.bodyText: Thank you @manstis for reporting this. I have fixed this with other changes.
replies.author: akumar074

timeline.bodyText: I'll be picky here... but the property name is not clear... equalsBehaviorSelect would be more appropiate than equalsBehaviorSelectContainer. The same would apply for  the @Datafield... and the html template.
